BRAND_ID_NOT_EXISTS: Brand with given ID does not exists
BRAND_CAT_NOT_EXISTS: Brand category combination does not exists
PROD_BARCODE_EXISTS: Product with given barcode already exists
PROD_ID_NOT_EXISTS: Product with given ID doest not exist
INVENTORY_TOO_BIG: Inventory size can't be more than 10,000,000
INVENTORY_ID_NOT_EXISTS: Inventory with given ID does not exist
